mapper.insert:
insert into single_choice( sc_id, sc_subject, sc_point, sc_stem, sc_option1, sc_option2, sc_option3, sc_option4, sc_answer, sc_analysis, sc_t_name, sc_tb_id, sc_ct_id) values( #{id}, #{subjectId}, #{point}, #{stem}, #{option1}, #{option2}, #{option3}, #{option4}, #{answer}, #{analysis}, #{tname}, #{tbId}, #{ctId}
)
